title: Secret Documents Show Hamas Tried to Persuade Iran to Join Its Oct. 7 Attack
content: The Times reviewed the minutes of 10 meetings among Hamas’s top leaders. The records show the militant group avoided several escalations since 2021 to falsely imply it had been deterred — while seeking Iranian support for a major attack.
summary: The Times reviewed the minutes of 10 meetings among Hamas’s top leaders. The records show the militant group avoided several escalations since 2021 to falsely imply it had been deterred — while seeking Iranian support for a major attack.

title: Canada Tightens Immigration Policy And Leaves Thousands in Limbo
content: Canada has long had one of the world’s most open immigration policies. Now, faced with a growing popular backlash, it’s changing the rules.
summary: Canada has long had one of the world’s most open immigration policies. Now, faced with a growing popular backlash, it’s changing the rules.

title: Alex Salmond, Scotland’s Former First Minister, Dies at 69
content: Mr. Salmond led the Scottish National Party twice, guiding it from a fringe political group into a powerful electoral force in Britain.
summary: Mr. Salmond led the Scottish National Party twice, guiding it from a fringe political group into a powerful electoral force in Britain.

title: How South Korea’s Dogs Became Members of the Family
content: They have become pampered family members in South Korea, which has the world’s lowest birthrate and where much of the population lives alone.

title: Rise of the Dragons: Fire-Breathing Drones Duel in Ukraine
